data.title: Last tribute to Gary Cooper
data.meta_description: Title supplied by cataloger.; Photograph was edited for publication purposes.Photograph caption dated May 16, 1961 reads, "Gary Cooper's widow, Veronica, right and the couple's daughter. Maria, 24, both composed in their grief, arrived for the funeral. Mrs. Cooper carried a prayer book." Cooper's funeral took place at Church of the Good Shepherd in Beverly Hills.
